sections.instructor: Levin, Anna, Advisory: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent. Note: Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-171 should NOT enroll in BIOSC-170. Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-171 will NOT receive credit for BIOSC-170. Note: 100% online course - no required online meetings. Instruction will be provided through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to begin.

Taugher, Kimberly, Advisory: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent. Note: Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-171 should NOT enroll in BIOSC-170. Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-171 will NOT receive credit for BIOSC-170. Note: 100% online course - no scheduled  meetings. This course may use exam proctoring software to administer exams. Access to a computer with audio and video capability is required. Instruction will be provided through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to begin.
